title: Noam Chomsky: Peacemakers, Profiteers and Poverty (1995)
description:
Professor Chomsky predicted a worsening of the gap between rich and poor and criticized Republican policy on welfare reform. He claimed that the U.S. is controlled, not by its government, but by big business.
